channel.title: Tennessee on MicroModa
channel.description: Recent content in Tennessee on MicroModa

item.title: Austin Peay State University
item.description: Austin Peay State University (APSU), located in Clarksville, Tennessee, is the state’s fastest growing university. We are home to the Govs and Lady Govs.

item.title: Cumberland University
item.description: A private, 4-year institution founded in 1842 and located in the greater Nashville area with a long history of valued education and athletics.

item.title: Freed-Hardeman University
item.description: Freed-Hardeman University is a private liberal arts university associated with the churches of Christ located in Henderson, TN.

item.title: King University
item.description: King University is a Presbyterian, doctoral-level comprehensive university. Founded in 1867 as King College, the University offers more than 80 majors, minors, pre-professional degrees and concentrations in fields such as business, nursing, law, medical and health sciences, pharmacy, education, and humanities. Graduate programs are offered in business administration, education, and nursing.

item.title: Lincoln Memorial University
item.description: Can you see it? Your career path is here. Lincoln Memorial University is a values-based learning community dedicated to providing educational experiences in the liberal arts and professional studies. LMU strives to give students a foundation for a more productive life by upholding the principles of Abraham Lincoln’s life: a dedication to individual liberty, responsibility, and improvement; a respect for citizenship; recognition of the intrinsic value of high moral and ethical standards; and a belief in a personal God. LMU is a Career Path University.

item.title: Lipscomb University
item.description: Lipscomb University is a faith-based, liberal arts institution dedicated to challenging students academically, spiritually and as global community citizens.
